name: Star Wars UI Library
description:
This is a work-in-progress UI Kit.


Note: Instead of waiting for this file to be perfect or finished I thought it'd be neat to release early and keep publishing as I work on it. Layers aren't finished being named, I have plenty that I still need to complete, and more of the films to explore.


This Figma UI Kit focuses on:

  1. Recreating Star Wars interfaces as seen throughout the movies and games.
  2. Creating UI components with a Star Wars theme in mind.


If you're interested in Fictional / Future / Fantasy / Fake / Film UI you can learn more at HUDS & GUIS also checkout my are.na channel on FUI.


Shout out to AurekFonts for recreating and offering a huge selection of Star Wars typefaces.



Update July, 18th, 2021: Added Falcon Targeting UI with a little motion.


Update November, 27th, 2021: Finally finished that miscellaneous empire UI that was hanging out on the Film UI Page.


Update December, 18th, 2021: Added the Star Destroyer "target range sensor" no idea what its real name is. I believe it's an interface from Episode 8.


Update January, 24th, 2022: Started working on the X-wing targeting UI. Not completely finished but updated with the work in progress file.
